entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:05 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to periods of rain in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
